PRICING FAQ

Is this template free to use?

Yup! This template is free to use for any project.

Why does a free template have a pricing page?

The pricing page is part of the boilerplate. It shows how the pricing page
integrates into the billing portal and the Stripe Checkout flows.

What license is the template under?

The template is under the MIT license.

Can I try out purchase flows without real a credit card?

Our demo page SaasStarter.work has a functional demo page, using Stripe's test
environment.

You can use the credit card number 4242 4242 4242 4242 with any future expiry
date to test the payment and upgrade flows.

Tait Media Solutions

TAIT MEDIA SOLUTIONS

About Us


PERFORMANCE-DRIVEN MARKETING

Tait Media Solutions is a performance-driven marketing agency for architecture
and professional service firms. We replace outdated websites and vague marketing
strategies with systematic solutions focused on one thing: generating qualified
leads.

We provide radical transparency through our proprietary analytics dashboard,
giving you a clear view of your ROI. Our approach combines minimalist design
with cutting-edge engineering to build digital solutions that work harder, so
your firm can focus on what matters.


WEB DESIGN

The High-Performance Foundation


THE FOUNDATION

A custom-designed, high-performance website engineered for speed and conversion.
Built with Svelte 5 to turn visitors into leads.

   
 * Engineered with Svelte 5 for superior speed
 * Built-in SEO & conversion optimization
 * Integrated analytics dashboard from day one
   

Explore The Foundation â†’


MARKETING

The Data-Driven Growth Engine


THE GROWTH ENGINE

A full-service retainer using real-time dashboard data to fuel targeted
strategy. We manage your brand and content to consistently generate qualified
opportunities.

   
 * Full-service management (content, social)
 * Strategy informed by dashboard data
 * Transparent monthly reporting
   

Power Your Growth â†’

Powered by the


NO VISUALS DATA ENGINE

Our proprietary analytics engine cuts through the noise to show you the exact
ROI of every visitor, click, and lead.

While other agencies hide behind vague reports, we provide radical transparency.
The No Visuals Data Engine is built into every site we design, giving you a
clear, actionable window into your marketing performance and full ownership of
your client data.


OWN YOUR DATA

Complete control over your client analytics and insights


REAL-TIME TRACKING

Live dashboard updates every visitor interaction


ACTIONABLE INSIGHTS

Clear ROI metrics that drive business decisions


PERFORMANCE FOCUS

Built for speed with minimal impact on site performance

Our Process


HOW WE BUILD YOUR SUCCESS

Our proven three-phase methodology transforms your digital presence from
foundation to scale, with full transparency every step of the way.

01 â€” Foundation & Optimization02 â€” Content & Growth03 â€” Scale & Amplify

01


FOUNDATION & OPTIMIZATION

Building Your Digital Foundation

We start with the basics - setting up your digital infrastructure, optimizing
your existing assets, and establishing tracking systems that give you clear
visibility into what's working.

KEY DELIVERABLES

Case Studies


OUR WORK

We believe in practicing what we preach. Our first case study documents the
complete transformation of our own agency - from outdated systems to
cutting-edge digital architecture.

In Progress Agency Rebrand


TAIT MEDIA SOLUTIONS

COMPLETE AGENCY TRANSFORMATION

A comprehensive documentation of rebuilding our own digital presence from the
ground up. From an outdated Jekyll stack to cutting-edge Svelte, this case study
will show the complete process of modernizing a marketing agency.

WHAT THIS CASE STUDY WILL COVER:


Complete brand identity overhaul

Svelte 5 + TypeScript architecture

Custom 3D process visualization

Performance optimization (98+ PageSpeed)

Advanced analytics dashboard integration
